snippet.title: "The Legend of Dead Kel" Trailer
snippet.description:
Defy the pirate Dead Kel and search for the treasures of Gallows End in this new downloadable content. Glimpse the monster behind the myth in the new trailer! Coming to Xbox 360, PC, and PS3 on March 20th. 

For more info about "The Legend of Dead Kel" look here: http://reckoning.qa.amalur.com/r/dlc/dead-kel

Purchase the full game: http://reckoning.amalur.com/r/buy

Play the demo: http://reckoning.amalur.com/r/demo

Preview and purchase the soundtrack: http://itunes.apple.com/us/preorder/kingdoms-amalur-reckoning/id494319218
http://www.amazon.com/Kingdoms-Amalur-Reckoning-Soundtrack/dp/B006YBD77C/ref=sr_1_2?ie=UTF8&qid=1327416548&sr=8-2

http://reckoning.com
http://amalur.com
http://facebook.com/reckoningthegame
http://twitter.com/reckoninggame
